Updated November     pm



The mens basketball team went  in six games over the winter break and will face the Washburn Ichabods on Saturday PERIOD

On Jan PERIOD  the Hornets defeated the Pittsburg State Gorillas  PERIOD They also tied an MIAA record for the most overtimes in a single game and played four overtime periods before winning the game PERIOD

The Hornets made six of  foul shots in the final overtime period to secure the win PERIOD This victory moved the Hornets into second place in the MIAA PERIOD

The Hornets are  so far this season and the Ichabods have a record of  PERIOD

The annual two game series between the Hornets and the Ichabods is referred to as the Turnpike Tussle because if someone were to take the Turnpike between Emporia and Topeka it would only take  minutes PERIOD

The two teams are sure to have a heated match PERIOD

We have been rivals for over  years said head coach David Moe PERIOD We are just right down the road from each other. the series has had its share of incidents between fans and mascots PERIOD

The mascots got into a fight in my second or third year and its just very exciting Moe said PERIOD It will be a very exciting match and a great environment. the Hornets will have to strive not to become distracted by their rivalry with the Ichabods PERIOD

Washburn has always been one of the most talented teams in our league Moe said PERIOD Washburns big athletic and talented and theyre going to come here and try and intimidate us and we cant let them intimidate us. washburn is known for being a very physically tough opponent that can wear down the opposing team PERIOD

I think we need to play more physical than them and we have to play smart said senior center Shang Ping PERIOD I think we will be ready to play Saturday. the team is anxious to play against Washburn PERIOD

I know they are a pretty talented team said junior guard Jeremiah Box PERIOD The fans are always crazy and I am really looking forward to this game. this will be the one hundred and eighty-ninth meeting between Emporia State and Washburn PERIOD

The teams are tied  coming into the game on Saturday which may make the atmosphere even more hectic as the two teams battle to take the lead in the series PERIOD

David Moe has a record of  and is in his eighth season as the head coach PERIOD

Washburns head coach Bob Chipman has a record of  in his thirtieth year PERIOD

He has been there a long time Moe said PERIOD Its not easy having the amount of success he has had over the years that he has been there. the Hornets will play against the Ichabods at  p.m PERIOD Saturday at White Auditorium PERIOD

Matthew PierceThe Bulletin
